lines.text: While up in New York, one female guest of Bob & Ray's stayed at the Bob & Ray Hotel. Now back to round two.

I just came from Nottington. Do you know that it was announced today that at the Harvest Moon festival tomorrow, there'd be an archery contest and the best bowman in the land will be awarded a hundred gold crowns.
By Jove, a hundred gold crowns is a lot of money!
Yes, why don't you enter, Robin?
You could use that kind of loot.
It would be splendid indeed because it isn't stealing, I wouldn't have to give any of it to the poor.
